column4: I really need help! My family's going to the beach in a few hours, and i want to be able to ssh into my machine b4 i leave!! CAN ANYBODY PLEASE HELP!?
but i doesn't seem to have worked
you need ssh-server on the box you want to connect to
weird, try sudo apt-get update and then sudo apt-get install openssh-server
openssh-server is already the newest version
to make sure you have it running
then you can try to connect to that box from elsewhere
eeek were leaving for the beach in 70 min
i cant really remember where sshd writes its log
why do you need to ssh?  could we accomplish the same some other way
